body: R.I.P Snowballing AD Carries you will be missed.

{{item:3070}}

Things that happen between the end of season, and the start of a new season, are far from set in stone, just because they experiment with things on the off-season, doesn't mean you should start crying about changes you don't like.

Its TENTATIVE preseason changes.

Yes they did remove the ability to purchase regular wards from the shop. HOWEVER they changed trinkets to compensate and gave supports new ward placing items.

Its a whole rework thing on items and vision which might simply be scrapped come next season if its seen as too game altering.

Can't wait to test that new stuff out.
As a bronzie who doesn't use either of those things I could care less... but ty for removing any form of gold related decision making Riot, well done.
